attributes.action: Award Captain Tom Moore with a Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom deserves this for raising such an amazing amount of money for the NHS and being an inspiration to everyone during this time. During this unprecedented time, Captian Tom has lifted the spirits of the entire country. On the lead up to his 100th birthday, I think he and his family deserve this Knighthood to go alongside his card from the Queen.
attributes.background: This is a simple one in my opinion - award Captain Tom Moore with a Knighthood, which he 100% deserves. At the time of writing this, he has raised over £12,200,000. Having only started out to raise £1000, that's an unbelievable achievement and one that should be remembered by us all.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
